title: 96/505/EC: Council Decision of 25 July 1996 concerning the conclusion of the Agreement on scientific and technical cooperation between the European Community and the State of Israel
header:
19.8.1996 EN Official Journal of the European Communities L 209/22
COUNCIL DECISION
of 25 July 1996
concerning the conclusion of the Agreement on scientific and technical cooperation between the European Community and the State of Israel
(96/505/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
The Agreement on scientific and technical cooperation between the European Community and the State of Israel is hereby approved on behalf of the Community.
The text of the Agreement is attached to this Decision.
The President of the Council shall, on behalf of the Community, give the notification provided for in Article 13 of the Agreement.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 July 1996.
For the Council
The President
H. COVENEY
(1)  Opinion delivered on 19 July 1996 (not yet published in the Official Journal).
(2)  OJ No L 136, 28. 5. 1975, p. 1.
